title: Reelfoot
description: An ex-Memphis cop and a friend of Carson is in trouble – but what kind of trouble?While trying to answer that question, Carson finds more questions - and all with no answers.What Carson also finds is trouble coming from all directions. The Mafia, the Teamsters Union, an unhappy sheriff and some very rough characters are all looking for his friend, and Carson is in the middle of this mess.An apparently senseless murder only complicates Carson’s problems, which makes getting to the truth more difficult.Things are not what they seem in Carson Reno’s adventure at ‘Reelfoot’
author: Gerald W. Darnell
